[ C ] a book or other piece of writing based on the writer's personal knowledge of famous people, places, or events: She has written a memoir of her encounters with famous movie stars over the years. memoirs [ plural ] (US also memoir)
a written record of a usually famous person's own life and experiences: She plans to write her memoirs.
